rows.label: qst201311_msg0001
rows.name: You are Darryth, I presume?

rows.label: qst201311_msg0002
rows.name:
That's me. Is there
something you want to know?

rows.label: qst201311_msg0003
rows.name:
We would like information
regarding the missing children
case here in Fons Maim.

rows.label: qst201311_msg0005
rows.name: That case, huh...

rows.label: qst201311_msg0006
rows.name:
I was asked to look into it,
but I can't find any information.
It's almost unnatural.

rows.label: qst201311_msg0007
rows.name:
People are saying it's like
they've been spirited away,
some mysterious phenomenon.

rows.label: qst201311_msg0008
rows.name:
So I haven't been able to find
anything at all. Sorry about that.

rows.label: qst201311_msg0010
rows.name: I see...

rows.label: qst201311_msg0011
rows.name:
Excuse me, were you just talking
about children being spirited away?

rows.label: qst201311_msg0012
rows.name: Yes, we were.

rows.label: qst201311_msg0013
rows.name:
My daughter, Maqqa, went out to
play and hasn't come back...

rows.label: qst201311_msg0014
rows.name:
The children she was playing
with are all gone too...
I've looked everywhere...

rows.label: qst201311_msg0015
rows.name:
I was thinking it might be
related to the recent
spiriting away incidents...

rows.label: qst201311_msg0019
rows.name:
Do you know where your
daughter was playing?

rows.label: qst201311_msg0020
rows.name: I'm sorry... I don't know that much...

rows.label: qst201311_msg0021
rows.name:
I'm searching for them now
with the other parents.

rows.label: qst201311_msg0022
rows.name:
It's possible they might have
found some new information...

rows.label: qst201311_msg0023
rows.name:
I would like to speak with
them. Where might I find them?

rows.label: qst201311_msg0024
rows.name:
Let's see... Lacusa lives in the
Theater District, and Celtie is
in the Commercial District.

rows.label: qst201311_msg0025
rows.name:
Doriath should be in Gwenith
Paddies, so you can ask
him directly there...

rows.label: qst201311_msg0026
rows.name: Thank you. Understood.

rows.label: qst201311_msg0027
rows.name:
Please rest assured. We
will find the children.

rows.label: qst201311_msg0028
rows.name: You will?!

rows.label: qst201311_msg0029
rows.name:
Yes. Please wait here for
the children's return.

rows.label: qst201311_msg0030
rows.name: Thank you. I'm counting on you!

rows.label: qst201311_msg0031
rows.name:
First, let's go to the other
parents' locations to find clues.
